title: Three Bullets for a Long Gun [1971 - South Africa] western
description:
Three Bullets... for a Long Gun (1971 - South Africa)

Action / Adventure / Drama
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0316759/


This movie has a sequel - They Call Me Lucky 1973

A Mexican bandit faces the firing squad and the call to fire is about to be made. Suddenly, out of nowhere, a lone man appears killing the entire squad. But this act of mercy was not performed out of kindness or compassion, for the stranger has one half of a map that leads to a cache of gold, the bandit has the other.


Video: XviD, 640x448, 23.976 fps, 2185 Kbps, 01h23m45s
Audio: MP3, 48000 Hz, mono, 125 kbps

VHSRip, English audio, optional Czech subtitles
